fulltext:
Diem Tran Nhu 
Senior Software Test Engineer 
OBJECTIVE 
 I'm a senior software test engineer with 8 years of experiences in Waterfall and Agile 
Methodology.  
 I have participated in many projects that involved in both manual and automated testing 
with different types of projects for mobile, web and window applications.

 I have good testing skill, adept problem solving, issue identification, critical thinking and 
analytical skills. Moreover, I possess good knowledge of electronic, telecommunication and 
network.
QUALIFICATIONS 
Professional Skills 
 Knowledgeable in Database PostgreSQL, Mongo, Java, Electronic and 
Telecommunication, C/C++, Matlab, Micro Controller, VB, HTML, 
background knowledge on Administrator Network.

 Well-organized

 Effectively works under tight deadlines and manage projects independently

 Expert in test case development, test execution, test management and test 
status reporting

 Work closely with project teams and partners to ensure milestones are 
defined, understood and being met. Identify dependencies, risks and drive 
resolution to roadblocks

 Analysis of incoming features/work
Interpersonal and Teamwork Skills 
 Honest, friendly, excellent communication skills.

 Ability to work efficiently, independently and as part of a team

 Committed to assisting others.
EDUCATION 
 9/ 2007- 06/ 2012 : * Danang University of Technology Electronic and 
Telecommunication Engineer (Honours)

 02/2009 - 11/2009 : * IT Training Certer of Danang University Of Technology 
Computer Technician ( Good )

 06/2011 - 09/2011 : * Truong Tan Group Training Center Cisco Certified Network 
Associate ( Honours )

 03/2012 - 05/2012 : * Atlanta Training Center English ( level C)

* Danang University Of Technology Toiec
